output.sentences: Long ago giants ran through the valley, dropping various items such as broken buckles.
Some giant children had dropped peices of a whistle.
Now people, who know nothimg of the Giant Folk, stare and wonder, "Did an artist make this to represent our bones?"
"Is this a statue once worshipped?" They ponder not knowing it is an old chess piece.
The totem poles and bones and dieties stay on the land now owned by a muesam, until the Giant Folk come out of hiding.
